CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Without any device optimization , the device afforded an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of 0.50 V , a short - circuit current density ( J sc ) of 1.42 mA / cm^2 , a fill factor ( FF ) of 42.4% , and a preliminary power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 0.30% under an AM 1.5 simulated solar light at 100 mW / cm^2 ( Figure 7 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| solar light |

In the given paragraph, the only material mentioned is "solar light." It is specified as "AM 1.5 simulated solar light" and has a power intensity of 100 mW/cm2.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| solar light |

In the revised analysis, I have only identified "solar light" as a material name since it is the only term that clearly refers to a material. The term "AM 1.5 simulated solar light" can be considered a more specific description of the solar light, but it still refers to the same material.
